org.ncg.core

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ncg.core.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents the map of locations in the game. The location objects must all exist in the application's instance before this class can be instantiated.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
